Mẫu đã bị xóa hoặc đây là mẫu chuẩn hoặc chưa xác nhận thông tin cần xóa.' else 'Cannot delele this item. You have not confirmed yet or invalid report form.' end as message return end end if not exists (select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @form) begin select 'form' as field, replace(@$recordHasBeenChanged, '%s', rtrim(case when @@language ='v' then @ten_maubc else @ten_maubc2 end)) as message return end if @$loai = 2 begin update v20dmmaubc set ten_maubc = @ten_maubc, ten_maubc2 = @ten_maubc2, h_line1 = '', h_line12 = '', h_line2 = '', h_line22 = '', h_line3 = '', h_line32 = '', h_line4 = '', h_line42 = '', h_line5 = '', h_line52 = '' where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @form end if @$loai = 1 begin declare @max int, @f varchar(64) set @max = 65 while @max < 90 begin select @f = @ma_maubc + char(@max) if exists(select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @f) set @max = @max + 1 else break end select @f = @ma_maubc + char(@max) if exists (select 1 from v20dmmaubc where ma_maubc = @ma_maubc and form = @f) begin select 'loai' as field, case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không thể tạo mẫu báo cáo.' else 'Cannot create this item.' end as message return end insert into v20dmmaubc(ma_maubc, form, ten_maubc, ten_maubc2, title, title2, h_line1, h_line12, h_line2, h_line22, h_line3, h_line32, h_line4, h_line42, h_line5, h_line52, loai_maubc, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2, ma_td1, ma_td2, ma_td3, sl_td1, sl_td2, sl_td3, ngay_td1, ngay_td2, ngay_td3, gc_td1, gc_td2, gc_td3, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, s8, s9) values (@ma_maubc, @f, @ten_maubc, @ten_maubc2, upper(@ten_maubc), upper(@ten_maubc2), '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, null, null, 0, 0, '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null, '', '', '', '', '', '', 0, 0, 0, null, null, null) select * into #t from &defaultTable; where form = @form update #t set form = @f insert into &defaultTable; select * from #t drop table #t select '' as field, '' as message, 'before$LoadGridReportForm(this, ''' + @f + ''');' as script end

script.text: function loadFormFilter(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$Filter$ResponseComplete);setFormDefaultValue(a)}function close$VoucherFilter$(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$Filter$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function setFormDefaultValue(a){for(var c=a._formData$Name="ten_maubc, ten_maubc2".split(","),d=a._formData$Value.split(String.fromCharCode(255)),b=0;b<c.length;b++)a.setItemValue($func.trim(c[b]),d[b]);a.getItem("ten_form%l").value=a.getItem("ten_maubc%l").value;a.getItem("xoa_yn").disabled=true}function onChange$Filter$ReportForm(b){var a=b.parentForm;a.getItem("xoa_yn").checked=false;a.request("ReportForm","ReportForm",["form"])}function onChange$Filter$FormType(b){var a=b.parentForm;a.getItem("xoa_yn").disabled=a.getItem("loai").value!=3;if(a.getItem("loai").value!=3)a.getItem("xoa_yn").checked=false}function on$Filter$ResponseComplete(g,c){var a=c.object,f=c.type.Context,e=c.type.Result;switch(f){case"Checking":var d=a.grid;before$LoadGridReportForm(a,a.getItemValue("form"));d._formName=$func.trim(a.getItem("ten_maubc%l").value);d._alterTitle=[null,[["%s",d._formName.toString(),true]]];break;case"ReportForm":for(var b=0;b<a._formData$Name.length;b++)a.setItemValue($func.trim(a._formData$Name[b]),e[b].Value?$func.trim(e[b].Value):"")}}function before$LoadGridReportForm(d,c){var a=d.grid,b=[];a._formCode=c;Array.add(b,{Name:"form",Opr:"=",Value:a._formCode,Type:"String",Ignore:false});a.set_externalKey(b)}

action.text: if exists(select 1 from v20dmmaubc where form = @form) begin select ten_maubc, ten_maubc2 from v20dmmaubc where form = @form return end
